body.p: This page is generated by Machine Translation from Japanese.

section.name: Duplicate host settings
section.p: Here are settings on the duplicate host. Available when the duplicate host to be treated as the same thing crawling at a different host name. For example, if you want the same site www.example.com and example.com in available.

subsection.name: How to set up
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click the menu duplicate host.

img.alt: A list of the duplicate host

subsection.name: Canonical name
subsection.p: Specify the canonical host name. Duplicate host names replace the canonical host name.

subsection.name: Duplicate names
subsection.p: Specify the host names are duplicated. Specifies the host name you want to replace.
